model

Class TradeOffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TradeOffer

  • public class TradeOffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a TradeOffer object that contains the IDs of the trade and player who placed the trade as well as Lists of offered and demanded resources and accepted and declined Traders

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TradeOffer(int tradeId, Player player, java.util.ArrayList<ResourceType> offer, java.util.ArrayList<ResourceType> demand, boolean server)

      • TradeOffer

                  Player player,
                  java.util.ArrayList<ResourceType> offer,
                  java.util.ArrayList<ResourceType> demand,
                  boolean server)
        The constructor
        Parameters:
        tradeId - ID of the new Trade
        player - Player who placed the trade
        offer - Resources the player offers
        demand - Resources the player demands
        server - True if server creates the object, false if Client creates the object
